product_name: Vedaka Tea Gold Pouch, 500 g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: Received the product packed just 15days before! And very secure packing. This is the first time I am using this product and I would say nothing special about the taste and aroma. But it is value for the money as it quite cheap compared to the other brands. Don't expect a great flavor, it's just OK! and towards the softer side. Give a try, you won't regrate.

reviews.review_title: Try atleast once. Chances are more that you may like it
reviews.review_body: Tea is superb in taste colour and aroma. Strong tea so you have to use less amount. Tea taste is a very personal matter. Some persons say it's not good.. But I think people from Gujarat and Maharashtra will surely like it's taste. I think it's worth a try considering its price and Amazon product.

Awesome taste .I think every one should try it once .I think when new product comes in the market  people hesitate to buy it but I think  when new product comes in the market any one had tried it once why we not.

reviews.review_title: No doubt low cost but high quality.
reviews.review_body: I have purchased more than six brands of tea(leaf) and different types of cost which is are more which are low  for flavors, quality color and brand name. Usually I drink Duncan's, Darjeeling tea, no doubt better in market. But as hobby I purchased  Vedaka gold tea and I received the product today (26/11/2019) at 11am. As a Egger I make (wife) two cups of tea. Really I want to say who who will reading my posts It is a more better than any other brand In market for it color and tastes flavor is as normal as. I highly recommend for its price (rs 150/500gms) parking rate rs 225So it greatly helpful for poor and middle class family (I'm also poor and unemployed). Finally thank Vedaka for low price and better tea.

1) This tea has a combination of some long leaf along with CTC2) Aroma is good3) the tea colour on preparation is pale yellow - similar to Tata Tea or Taj4) flavour is medium to strongVery good value for money

reviews.review_title: Rich in taste for light and milk tea drink lovers like me.
reviews.review_body: Me and my parents are tea sommeliers at home. We taste all kinds of teas like strong, light, iceteas and greenteas. When saw the review of this product of this seller we bought and tasted this. Didn't expect this will taste so great for cheaper price it's like luxurious tea that comes near to Taj, Red label, Lipton, Assam, Darjeeling and twinnings of it's smell and taste when had through milk. Far much better than Tata Gold premium tea for this price and taste. And I have ordered more from this Amazon seller now after when tasted hatsoff to this seller for this great tea. This review I say on behalf of milk tea and light tea drinking lovers not comparing with strong tea. Masala teas and strong teas are different categories it doesn't match with this.

reviews.review_title: If you like Tata Gold tea, you will not like this one.
reviews.review_body: This is the more expensive of the two tea variants from Amazon, the other being Vedaka Premium Tea.Since Amazon has copied both the names and even the packaging to an extent from Tata, my expectation was that this would be close in taste to Tata Gold.I like to drink my black tea strong, brewed tea, brewed for atleast 5 minutes with 95°C water. I add a few teaspooons milk afterwards for taste. So the flavour of tea cuts through and takes the centre stage. I don’t drink boiled tea with milk. So my observations probably don’t apply to that style of tea.This tea is predominantly some cheap commercial variant of CTC Assam tea leaves with a sprinkling of some Darjeeling like tea leaves added to the mix - see my photo with this review.As far as flavour is concerned, it is very very muted when compared to Tata Gold and is probably closer to BB Red Label.In closing, if you like Tata Gold tea, you will NOT like this one, don’t be fooled by Amazon’s copycat branding and name.If you like Red Label tea, in the boiled variant of it with milk and sugar, this one will probably taste similar to you.

I gave only 3stars as i did not liked the flavour. If added less powder the tea does not have tea flavour, if the tea powder added bit extra the tea becomes strong. Basically i love tea and drink only tea all the time and no other hot beverages and everyone in my family and friends says i make the best tea and now i myself feeling troubled to make out best tea with flavour and tasty using this tea powder. People who love very strong tea can purchase this tea powder.
